title: Leading cigarette brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2016 , by sales value
summary: This is a bar chart representing Brand in the x axis and Sales value in million GBP in the y axis.
The Sales value in million GBP is appeared to be the highest at Brand Sterling and lowest at Brand Windsor.
The highest value at Brand Sterling is 3.27x times more than the lowest value at Windsor.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Sales value in million GBP in each Brand on the y axis.
The maximum Sales value in million GBP 1511.3 is found at Brand Sterling and the minimum is found at Windsor where Sales value in million GBP is 461.9.
